resources.string: You can select %1$d photos at most
You can select at most one photo
Cannot access camera. Allow App to access your camera in settings.
Cannot access microphone. Allow App to access your microphone in settings.
There\'s an issue with audio recording. Please check your microphone settings.
There\'s an issue with your device\'s storage
Permission not granted. Allow Small Word to access your phone\'s functions?
Permission not granted. Allow Small Word to access your phone\'s functions in settings.
If you return to recording screen, previously taken photo/video will be automatically deleted. Are you sure to return?
Video you picked is too long. Only the first %d seconds of the video will be used. Tap OK to confirm.
Video you picked is too long. Only the first %d minutes of the video will be used. Tap OK to confirm.
Please pick a file not larger than %1$s
